option.name: fileSummaryMaps
option.value: {"C:/Users/Admin/Desktop/PROJECT_Python/project_posm_calc":"{\"/cost_calc.py\":\"This file does not contain any classes or functions. Instead, it performs the following tasks:\\n\\n1. Reads in several Excel files containing data related to display models, stores, POSM (Point of Sale Materials), and prices.\\n2. Calculates the total quantity of displays by model and merges this information with the POSM data to determine the required POSM for each model.\\n3. Calculates the total cost of POSM by model, category, channel, and pool shop, using the price information from the Excel files.\\n4. Generates a report with the POSM cost information and writes it to a new Excel file named \\\"posm_cost_report.xlsx\\\".\",\"/make.py\":\"This file does not contain any classes. It contains the following functions:\\n\\n`select_file`: Allows the user to select an Excel file and populates the corresponding entry field.\\n\\n`calculate`: Reads the selected Excel files, performs various calculations and data manipulations, and generates a report in a new Excel file.\\n\\nIn summary, this file is a Tkinter-based application that allows the user to select several Excel files, performs calculations on the data, and generates a comprehensive report in a new Excel file.\"}"}
